subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Rafael Nadal opened his grass-court season with a 7-6 (5), 6-7 (5), 6-2 victory over Marcos Baghdatis that sent him into the quarterfinals of the Mercedes Cup.
snippet: Top-seeded Rafael Nadal opened his grass-court season with a 7-6 (5), 6-7 (5), 6-2 victory over Marcos Baghdatis that sent him into the quarterfinals of the Mercedes Cup.
